Speex gives better compression of voice files than MP3

PS. to the uploader: why use RAR? It's a non-free format and isnt as widely compatible than zip. Admittedly, zip does give bigger files, but most people using bittorrent wont be bandwidth metered anyway. If you want a good balance between compatibility and small files, I'd recommend 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org/ which gives smaller files than zip and is a free/open format. Anyone who can open a RAR archive can open a 7zip archive, since winrar supports 7zip. Or even better, if you don't archive files at all, people can choose which ones they want to download.
